issue.title: [Dev] Replace basic auth with token auth for JIRA
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16708](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16708). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Jira allows for the creation of [PATs](https://confluence.atlassian.com/enterprise/using-personal-access-tokens-1026032365.html) to use in scripts and basic auth is [deprecated](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/platform/deprecation-notice-basic-auth-and-cookie-based-auth/) in Jira Cloud. The Jira python package already supports token authentication with minimal changes required.
